div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.h3: White Pass School District, 26 days ago
div.p: If you need meals and are currently not receiving meals please call the school, so we can make sure to package enough for everyone. 360-497-7300.Tuesday deliveries provide meals for Tuesday, Wednesday, and Thursday. Friday deliveries provide meals for Friday and Monday.

div.h3: White Pass Jr/Sr High, 30 days ago
div.p: Well done Jayden Williams and London Short - Top scorers on vocabulary.com. White Pass ranked 7th in Washington State this past week. Lets see if we can make it to number one. Keep learning new words!

div.h3: White Pass School District, about 1 month ago
div.p: Meal delivery service is now going to bundle meals & deliver 2 days a week.Starting Fri, 3/27 we will deliver breakfast and lunch for 2 days, Fri & Mon. On Tue’s, WP will deliver breakfast and lunch for 3 days, Tues, Wed and Thur. Food Delivery at drop off locations:10:30-11am

div.h3: White Pass Jr/Sr High, about 1 month ago
div.p: https://www.invested.org/campaigns/white-pass-junior-senior-hs This is WP's personal page that allows the public to donate funds for the ASB InvestEd account, which is the account we use to provide assistance to students- school supplies, clothing, housing, sports fees, etc.

img.alt: InvestED PLEDGES $250,000 TO SUPPORT STUDENTS IN NEED DURING COVID-19 SCHOOL SHUTDOWN

White Pass School District does not discriminate in any programs or activities on the basis of sex, race, creed, religion, color, national origin, age, veteran or military status, sexual orientation, gender expression or identity, disability, or the use of a trained dog guide or service animal and provides equal access to the Boy Scouts and other designated youth groups. The following employees have been designated to handle questions and complaints of alleged discrimination: Civil Rights and Title IX Coordinator: Dr. Paul Farris: 360-497-3791, PFarris@whitepass.k12.wa.us; and 504 Coordinator: Pretrina Mullins: 360-497-5816, pmullins@whitepass.k12.wa.us. Address: PO Box 188, Randle, WA 98377.
